cobalt/home_1: Welcome to the Cobalt settings page!
cobalt/home_3: Click here to join the ColdfireDZN discord server for questions, issues, suggestions, and more.
cobalt/home_5: Please leave a positive, 5-star review on the MC-Market and/or NamelessMC resource page.
cobalt/ext_update_info: Disable this if your site is slow and/or the updater is throwing errors.
cobalt/ez_msg_1: Please use the downloaded ZIP provided from MC-Market.
cobalt/ez_msg_6: An error occurred. Verify your ZIP file and try again.
cobalt/ez_msg_7: An error occurred. Your file must be a valid ZIP!
cobalt/ez_update_2: Download the latest zip file from MC-Market.
cobalt/ez_update_3: Click to upload the zip file, then press the "update" button. The page will reload and Cobalt should be updated!
cobalt/ez_update_4: The page may take 10-15 seconds to reload after pressing the update button.
cobalt/update_check_no_update_2: You are using the latest Cobalt version.
cobalt/update_available_2: To update, use the easy updater.
cobalt/update_notif: Show alert to staff when there is a Cobalt update?
cobalt/serve_lib_cdn_2: Note: Some libraries (font-related) will still be served via CDN if this is off
cobalt/webp_compression_2: Value between 1-100. Lower value generates lower quality but faster loading webp images, while higher value generates higher quality but slower loading webp images.
cobalt/webp_compression_3: You will have to re-upload the images above for this to take effect. 75 is the recommended value. DO NOT change unless you know what you are doing!
cobalt/coverlay: Primary Color over Header Background Image?
cobalt/coverlay_2: If no background image, this will make your header background the primary color.
cobalt/blur_header_bg_2: If enabled, you must disable color overlay.
cobalt/al: Animate logo? (logo will slowly move up and down)
cobalt/navbar_alignment_2: Center alignment only works with top navbar.
cobalt/navbar_offset_2: Used to center the navbar when navbar alignment is set to center. Negative values move the navbar left, positive values move it right. The farther from 0px the value is, the more the navbar moves.
cobalt/navbar_offset_3: Only change this value if your navbar isn't centered.
cobalt/style_store_link: Change store link into button? Note: requires the setting above to be set, and icon will not work on top center navbar.
cobalt/store_url_2: Only used when the setting below is enabled.
cobalt/nav_store_glow: Add glow effect to navbar store button? Doesn't work on center navbar.
cobalt/ds_box: Enable Discord and Server Status Texts?
cobalt/discord_server_1: DON'T include the http:// or https://
cobalt/ds_breakpoint_2: The width of the screen in pixels which the texts will no longer display on either side of the logo.
cobalt/news_btn: Enable Read Older News Posts Button?
cobalt/vote_rewards: Voting Rewards Text (doesn't work with voting plugin)
cobalt/lr_modal_image: Show images above on login/register modals/pages?
cobalt/lr_coverlay: Enable Primary Color over on Login/Register Images?
cobalt/lr_coverlay_2: Requires above setting to be enabled.
cobalt/wb_t_1: Leave blank to disable welcome box
cobalt/wb_skin_id_2: To get this id, follow these instructions:
cobalt/wb_skin_id_5: Click on the skin you want
cobalt/wb_skin_id_6: The URL of the resulting page should look something like https://namemc.com/skin/8223f53ee9430528
cobalt/wb_skin_id_7: Copy the ID after the /skin/ part of the URL
cobalt/wb_skin_id_8: For more help, join the ColdfireDZN discord server (linked on the home tab).
cobalt/portal_imm: Portal Icons Mobile Margin from Top
cobalt/portal_color_overlay: Enable primary color overlay on portal?
cobalt/portal_ds_texts: Enable discord/server status texts on portal?
cobalt/portal_fa_icons: Use Font Awesome icons instead of images?
cobalt/upload_settings_2: Click to upload a new settings file. Cobalt settings will change to those stored in the file. Note: It is recommended to backup your settings by clicking below before doing this.
cobalt/restore_backup_2: Are you sure you want to restore this backup? All of your settings will be reverted to the settings stored in the backup.
cobalt/delete_backup_2: Are you sure you want to delete this backup? It will be lost permanently.
cobalt/iu_upload_new: To upload a new image, first delete the old one
cobalt/iu_click_upload: Click to upload the image! It will automatically be converted to webp format to optimize your website!
cobalt/settings_error: An error occured! Please make sure you are uploading the correct file!
cobalt/image_error:
An error occured while uploading your image! Please make sure the following are true:
  • The file you are uploading is a .png, .jpg, or .jpeg.
  • You are running PHP 7.4.
  • You have the PHP GD extension installed.
  • In FTP, the uploads folder (in the root directory of NamelessMC, where the folders custom, modules, and core are) has the file permission 755.
  • The values "upload_max_filesize" and "post_max_size" are set to 20M in your php.ini file. If not, contact your host on how to edit this file. After editing these values, make sure to restart your webserver.
cobalt/settings_file_reset: [Cobalt Error]: There was an error with your settings file and it has been reset. Please contact ColdfireDZN support.
cobalt/saving_setting_error: [Cobalt Error]: There was an error saving a setting. Setting ID: {x}, Value: {y}
cobalt/full_body_avatars: Enable full body avatars in some places? (news posts, etc)
cobalt/store_box_note: You must have the welcome box enabled for the store box to appear. The store box only appears to users that aren't logged in.
cobalt/rules_fa_icons: Use Font Awesome Icons Instead of Image URLs?
cobalt/lr_error_1: There was an error loading this menu. The website owner needs to follow these steps to fix it:
cobalt/lr_error_2: 1. Make sure the hostname value in core/config.php in FTP matches your site url.
cobalt/lr_error_3: 2. If you are using the www. prefix make sure the force www option is enabled in StaffCP -> Configuration -> General Settings.
cobalt/update_check_error: An error occurred when checking for updates. Please check the "other" error log.
